page.title: 17WORTHEN - EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Although farming is the main feature of this area, it only employs comparatively few workers in the community. Most of the farms are worked by the owner or tenant, with the help of a member of the family, and at the most one other employee. At busy times like harvest or haytime many of the local men are employed on a casual basis after their normal times of work. Garage, and post office do not employ any other than family; the few workers at the small local bus garage all come into the area for employment. Shropshire County Council roads and bridges employ several men in the village, and their are a number of lorry drivers and building site workers.
